lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Dome Petroleum reiterated in the SEC filing that its existence as a going concern is dependent on continuing the interim debt plan, due to expire on June 30, and winning agreement for its proposed restructuring plan.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Dome Petroleum Ltd's proposal to restructure debt of more than 6.10 billion Canadian dlrs includes provisions that may force the company to sell its 42 pct stake in <Encor Energy Corp Inc>, Dome said in a U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: After the five years are up, "under certain circumstances the shares of Encor may be required to be disposed," the company said.
